reviewText: This pictured many airplanes which were very interesting to see.  My husband loved the old WWII planes so enjoyed watching this film.

The DVD was for a friend who indicates that they are wonderful.  He is pleased, which pleases me, and I will continue to use the service in the future.

thank you
I got as an Xmas gift for boyfriend.  Wonderful footage, open about mistakes and the like, some parts were long and tedious, but as a history buff, he loved it!

Produst War in the Sky is a DVD, but the company but aramedia corrected the mistake fast and efficiently. I am very pleased with the handeling of it and their over all responsibility as a company. Will do buisness again, good guys to work with. PLus great fast shipping!
